meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Greg Bentley Cathy Guiles Melanie Spratford Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6338.

td.p: Greg Bentley, a law clerk from Pikeville, Kentucky
Cathy Guiles, a copy editor originally from Baltimore, Maryland
Melanie Spratford, a caterer from Chicago, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,201)

tr.td: FLIGHT
A BLANK EXPRESSION
HOME ICE
(Alex: We want you to name the NHL team or the city that has home ice.)
SIR WALTER SCOTT
NATURAL SELECTION
GOD DID IT!
